name: Gridmoon
description:
This game requires an HTC Vive!

If you don't have a Vive, the game will not run.

Gridmoon is a VR experiment with the mission of exploring a new type of player locomotion. Point and click the trackpad with either hand to warp around the environment. This is not a full game - there is no gameplay beyond simply moving around, seeing the sights, and relaxing.

Controls:

  • Lightly touch the trackpad to select a location to warp to.
  • Click the trackpad down to start warping.
  • If you have the trigger held down while you click, you'll warp much slower (for if you're not in a rush and just want to watch the effect)
